title: Does new Veigar wall stop Thresh's lamp?
body: Since Veigar's new wall stops any dash from going through it, will it stop a champion taking Thresh's lamp from leaving the circle?  Is Thresh's lamp coded as a dash?

replies.body: Yes, after an ally clicks the lantern their movement's just like any other dash or jump.
it this true for ally forced dash too? (like lee kick, thresh flay, alstar headbutt)
